aboutUs.title: about us
aboutUs.text: Kleynod Frame Gallery is a family business inspired by art. Our job is to create beautiful interior things that are pleasing to the eye and give joy. Our frame workshop has been operating in Lviv since 2003. Well-known artists, collectors, museums and galleries are our regular customers. We help to choose the framing design and perform it professionally.

cert.title: gift certificate
cert.text:
Our gift certificate for painting, photo and mirror framing services is an ideal gift for people who appreciate art, are creative or want to create cosiness at home. The minimum certificate price is UAH 500. 
Call, visit or email us to purchase a certificate.

customFrames.title: CUSTOM FRAMES
customFrames.text:
We make exclusive frames for mirrors and works of art - oval, round, arched frames with modern design and in different historical styles. 
A mirror or a painting in a round or oval frame with rich carvings, gilding or in a modern style will become a clear accent of an exquisite interior.

furniture.title: Exhibition furniture
furniture.text:
We make original furniture from natural wood (oak) for exhibition of art works. A large easel (more than 2 m high) is an exclusive interior design item. It is designed to display paintings, graphics, maps, etc. in galleries, museums, restaurants, offices, conference rooms and receptions. 
Small easel (height about 40 cm) is used to display works of art of small size. Stand (height about 1.5 m) is used for the sculpture exposition. All details (dimensions, style, plastic ornamental elements, quantity, price etc.) are discussed individually.

reproGraphics.title: Reproductions of historical graphics
reproGraphics.text: We offer high-quality reproductions of graphics and paintings, as well as photographs of Lviv in the late XIX — early XX century, which we can print at any size and to frame it. Such images may be a decoration in the office, living room, conference hall or an interesting souvenir for guests of Lviv.
reproGraphics.catalogIntro: The entire collection of reproductions can be viewed in the catalog at:
list: series of lithographs by Karol Auer "Lviv and its environs" 1837-1838 (29 lithographs)
lithographs by Anton Lange "View of the city of Lviv from the Wronowski Mountains
series of lithographs by Napoleon Orda, XIX century . (architectural landscapes of Ukraine)
collection of autolithographs "Lwow" by Odia Dobrovolsky, 1914-1915
graphics by Luka Dolynsky "Lion - Prince of Galicia
45 photographs of Lviv in the late nineteenth - early twentieth century

painting.title: Painting framing
painting.text: For the framing of paintings we offer a wide selection of mouldings of different styles: from modern flat mouldings to wide with a complex profile and luxurious ornaments. For a particularly rich design, it is possible to make a frame of several mouldings. Paintings on subframes can be framed in a tall moulding that completely covers the sides of the subframe. Small works of art can be visually expanded with a cardboard passepartout and decorated with slips.

graphics.title: graphics framing
graphics.text: Graphic works are usually framed using a passepartout, which visually expands the picture. Our masters professionally perform passepartout cutting of various shapes: square, rectangle, oval, circle, arch. We always have a wide palette of passepartout with paper, fabric and velvet coating. We often use several layers of passepartout to frame the graphics, separating them with a slip (decorative insert). For protection of work outside we use transparent or anti-glare glass, plastic (plexiglass). Graphic works also may be framed in the so-called "anti-frame" — framing with glass on top, which is fastened with special clips (without frame).

mirrors.title: mirror framing
mirrors.text: We offer mirror framing for your home or office. We can frame your own mirror or order for you a mirror of the necessary size and thickness (4 mm or 6 mm) with or without a facet. A large collection of moulding in different styles and colors allows you to get the perfect mirror for any interior.

embroidery.title: embroidery and tapestry framing
embroidery.text: One of our specializations is the stretching and framing of embroideries and tapestries. We offer clear or anti-glare glass to protect embroideries from dust. We have a large collection of mouldings and passepartouts that will satisfy any customer.

photos.title: photos framing
photos.text: We will help you to choose and make a harmonious design for your family, wedding photos, portraits, photo landscapes, etc. In addition to the ordinary photo framing with passepartout and frame, we can make a photo-collage (several photos are arranged within one frame) or a composition of individually framed photos.

customItems.title: 3d items framing
customItems.text: Medals, coins, clothes, music records or CDs, other small items in our framing will be unique interior accent.

passepartout.title: passepartout collection
passepartout.text: We always have a wide pallete of colors of high-quality cardboard passepartout from Koninklijke Moorman Karton (Netherlands) and other manufacturers. We offer a passepartout with a paper covering with a white or black cut/core, with a fabric and velvet covering, several shades of gold and silver passepartout, as well as the museum's acid-free passepartout 2.25 mm thick for valuable and antique works of art. We also sell passepartout in sheets (wholesale). We provide information on availability and prices by phone, e-mail, viber / telegram.
